content: © irarott increase 2016 © irarott increase 2016 to beg chain 5 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 3 count as beg double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in ring chain 3 5 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form chain-3 = 6 double_crochet & 6 chain-3 sps a ring round 2 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet double_crochet in same space round 1 chain 1 do not count as a st 12 single_crochet in ring as join 5 double_crochet in next chain-3 space double_crochet in next join = 12 sts st 5 double_crochet in next chain-3 space 5 times join = round 2 * chain 6 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook 6 times 30 sts working on opposite side of the chain round 3 chain 3 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next st chain 7 sl --> single_crochet in next 2 chs picot 5 times single_crochet st in 4th chain from hook chain 2 dtr in same in last 2 chs slip_stitch in next single_crochet of round 1 st as previous double_crochet chain 6 slip_stitch in 4th chain chain 14 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook chain 10 sl from hook chain 3 double_crochet in same st as previ- st in next single_crochet of round 1** repeat 5 more ous dtr chain 3 skip next 2 sts slip_stitch in next times from * to ** = 6 branches with 11 st 6 times = 6 branches with 2 picots on picots & 6 branches with 1 picot each branch finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 9 egap snowflake 9 snowflake 10 3 12 2 5 1 3 4 2 10 1 7 © irarott increase 2016 © irarott increase 2016 to beg chain 10 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet 30 double_crochet in ring join = 30 sts round 2 chain 1 do not count as a st here & to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form throughout single_crochet in same st as join chain 12 a ring skip 4 sts single_crochet in next st chain 12 skip 4 sts round 1 chain 1 do not count as a st here & 5 times join = 6 arches throughout 12 single_crochet in ring join = 12 sts round 3 chain 1 *work around next arch --> 4 single_crochet round 2 beg os in same st as join skip st os in picot 3 times 4 single_crochet** repeat 5 more next st skip st 5 times join with slip_stitch in times from * to ** join = 6 branches top of beg chain-3 = 6 open shells with 3 picots on
